TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was dismissed by her employer , ORG ( “ the Administration ” ; PERSON районна державна адміністрація ) from her position as a senior logistics specialist ( головний спеціаліст організаційного відділу секретаріату ) on account of her failure to meet the requirements of the post .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted civil proceedings for reinstatement in ORG ( the “ ORG ” ; PERSON районний суд ORG області ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE the court left the applicant 's claim without consideration on account of her failures to appear for the hearings . The applicant did not appeal against this decision within the statutory time - limit .

CARDINAL . On DATE following the applicant 's petition , the GPE Deputy Prosecutor instituted a protest , seeking to re - open the proceedings on account of the court 's failure to inform the applicant of the date of the last hearing .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of ORG ( the “ ORG ” ; GPE обласний суд ) found the protest substantiated , quashed the decision of CARDINAL DATE and remitted the case for a fresh consideration to ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's reinstatement claims . It found , however , that the dismissal record was incorrect , as in fact the applicant had not passed the probationary period . Accordingly , the court awarded the applicant CARDINAL NORP hryvnyas ( ORG ) in non - pecuniary damage . Both parties appealed .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment , but reduced the amount of compensation to ORG CARDINAL . The applicant appealed in cassation .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant 's request for leave to appeal in cassation against the court decisions of DATE and DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( “ the Bailiffs ” ; ORG виконавчої служби Городоцького районного управління юстиції ) initiated enforcement proceedings for the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was paid ORG DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Bailiffs terminated the enforcement proceedings in view of the debtor 's lack of funds .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted administrative proceedings against the Bailiffs complaining about their failure to collect the judgment debt due to her . These proceedings ended on DATE by a ruling of ORG , upholding the decision to leave the applicant 's complaint without consideration . The applicant did not appeal in cassation .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the enforcement proceedings were re - opened and on DATE the applicant was paid the remaining award of ORG CARDINAL .
